content.question: An object is launched at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> from a height <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>H</mi></math> above the ground with an initial velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> at an angle <math alttext="theta sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> below the horizontal, as shown in the figure. With respect to the indicated coordinate system, which of the following is a correct expression of the position vector <math alttext="vector r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> as a function of <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> for the object after it is launched?

choices.label: <math alttext="vector r equals, open parenthesis, v sub 0, times t, close parenthesis, times i hat plus, open parenthesis, H minus one half g, times t squared, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="vector r equals, open parenthesis, v sub 0, times t, times, the cosine of theta sub 0, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus open parenthesis, H minus v sub 0, times t, times the sine of theta sub 0, minus one half g, times t squared, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></math>

<math alttext="vector r equals, open parenthesis, v sub 0, times t, times, the cosine of theta sub 0, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus open parenthesis, H plus v sub 0, times t, times the sine of theta sub 0, minus one half g, times t squared, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></math>

<math alttext="vector r equals, open parenthesis, negative one half g, times t squared, plus v sub 0, times t, times, the cosine of theta sub 0, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus open parenthesis, H minus v sub 0, times t, times the sine of theta sub 0, minus one half g, times t squared, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="vector r equals, open parenthesis, v sub 0, times t, times, the cosine of theta sub 0, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus open parenthesis, H minus v sub 0, times t, times the sine of theta sub 0, minus one half g, times t squared, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>t</mi><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Motion in Two or Three Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
